strapiPost.title: City of Fayetteville Electoral Results
strapiPost.content:
With unofficial but informative results, Mayor Jordan will serve another term as Fayetteville Mayor.

  • Mayoral results:
    • Baucom with 721 (2%)
    • Harris with 1,967 (5%)
    • Terminella with 9,973 (25%)
    • Jordan 24,346 (68%)
  • Ward 1
    • Fimbres with 1,577 (20%)
    • Jones with 3,108 (38%)
    • Oyioka with 988 (12%)
    • Pettigrew with 2,414 (30%)
  • Ward 2
    • Chesser with 2,272 (36%)
    • Petty with 4,075 (64%)
  • Ward 3
    • Bunch with 7,464 (77%)
    • Tonnessen with 2,235 (23%)
  • Ward 4
    • Fire Cat with 764 (8%)
    • Hertzberg with 4,846 (51%)
    • Smith with 3,013 (31%)
    • Waddell with 933 (10%)

More information (and current information) can be found HERE
